textBox.richText: First Annual Your Neighborhood Experts Washington Park Garage Sale Need to get rid of stuff?  Need to add a few more sweet pieces of furniture? Come join me and my team for our first annual garage sale in a number of homes across Washington Park- 12 so far!  We’ve got a number of homes participating and are looking for more, so whatever you do, block off June 23rd from 9-2 for some shopping!  Check out my team website for more details: www.washingtonparkresidences.com House Maintenance To-Do's As we get into June, home maintenance projects begin to re-appear on many people’s calendars.  At the request of some clients, I’ve decided to write my own version of a home maintenance to do list.  These are some suggestions that I thought of today and I hope it helps you all! Day of Closing Call Excel to transfer utilities Water/Sewer is automatically transferred by title company When You Move In Paint before you move in any furniture! Rekey or Change your locks Set up Alarm System Set up Phone, Internet, TV Change your mailing address with post office and all of your bills and friends!! Set up electronic payment of mortgage Set up house account for joint home purchases Get a safety deposit box for house documents Change Garage Door Opener Code Set up iPhone alarms on garbage, recycling and street sweeping Every 3 Months: Change/Clean your furnace Filter Use self cleaning oven feature Every Year: Service your Furnace and Air Conditioning System Clean your sewer line Check batteries in smoke/CO2 detectors Renew Alarm with City of Denver Make sure garage door safety reverse is functioning Ensure all GFCI outlets are working Clean fridge coils Ensure Vent for Dryer is clear Re-caulk any tubs, sinks where seal is broken Clean out window wells in basement Clean dishwasher food filter Every October 15th Winterize your sprinkler system Check weather stripping, window and door seal Every May 15th Turn on your sprinkler system Aerate the lawn Every 3-5 Years Clean Windows Clean out Gutters Check Trim for painting Clean your air ducts Clean Chimneys Drain water heater to remove sediment (usually 1-2 gallons) Trim trees Clean Carpet
